text: @M2Madness There is clearly ZERO common sense here. None! None to be seen! It’s all gone! Discussing if the motorcycle crash is covid19?! DISCUSSING IT?! Like, how long for? A few days?! Takes me a millisecond to know the difference there. Are these people brain dead?! I just....?!?...no.😶
